Sporkatz 2.0 Half-Elf Rogue: 10
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Neutral Deity: Gozreh (N)
Experience: 9500/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 6; General: 2; Skill: 10 Selectable Feature Count: Elf (Heritage); Human (Heritage); Rogue (Key Ability); Rogue (Racket); Wizard (Arcane School)
Feats: Assurance (Acrobatics); Assurance (Deception); Assurance (Performance); Assurance (Thievery); Basic Wizard Spellcasting; Canny Acumen (Perception); Cat Fall; Clever Improviser; Elf Atavism; Fast Recovery; Hobnobber; Nimble Dodge; Quick Disguise; Quick Jump; Read Lips; Sabotage; Sidestep; Trap Finder; Trick Magic Item; Unwavering Mien; Wizard Dedication Wizard Features: Divination Rogue Features: Ability Boost (Dexterity); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks); Class Trained (Rogue); Debilitating Strike; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Deny Advantage; Dexterity; Evasion; General Feats; Great Fortitude; Perception Expert; Rogue Feats; Rogue Key Ability; Rogue Skills; Rogue's Racket; Save Expert (Reflex; Will); Save Trained (Fortitude); Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Sneak Attack; Surprise Attack; Thief; Vigilant Senses; Weapon Specialization; Weapon Tricks Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage Elf Features: Seer Elf
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 3 selections
Arcane School: 1 selection
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Elf Atavism: Has an elven heritage
General Feats: 2 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Rogue Feats: 6 selections
Rogue Key Ability: 1 selection
Rogue's Racket: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Wizard Dedication: Has the Arcane School and Arcane Spellcasting features
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +17 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Absalom Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained) Diplomacy: +14 (charisma; trained) Religion: +13 (wisdom; trained)
Acrobatics: +20 (dexterity; master) Intimidation: +16 (charisma; expert) Scribing Lore: +16 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +18 (intelligence; expert) Medicine: +11 (wisdom; untrained) Society: +16 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +18 (strength; expert) Nature: +11 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +20 (dexterity; master)
Crafting: +16 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +14 (intelligence; untrained) Survival: +11 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +16 (charisma; expert) Performance: +16 (charisma; expert) Thievery: +20 (dexterity; master)
Languages: Common; Elven; Jotun; Orcish; Sylvan; Terran
Skill Notes:
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 11 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Thief: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Untrained Improvisation: +10 on untrained skill checks
Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Wizard Dedication: Skill Trained (Arcana)
Assurance (Acrobatics): Can take an automatic 26 on Acrobatics checks
Assurance (Deception): Can take an automatic 24 on Deception checks
Assurance (Performance): Can take an automatic 24 on Performance checks
Assurance (Thievery): Can take an automatic 26 on Thievery checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half the normal time
Quick Disguise: Can create a disguise in 5 min
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and flat-footed
Seer Elf: +1 to Identify Magic and Decipher Writing of a magical nature
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Trap Finder: Gives +2 Perception and automatic Searches to find traps and allows disabling traps that require legendary proficiency in Thievery
Trick Magic Item: (1) Successful check on the related skill activates a magic item until the end of the turn
Combat
Hit Points: 108 Armor Class: 26 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+18 1d4+4 P/S R10'; strength; expert); Shortbow (+18 1d6 P [Crit +d10] R60'; dexterity; expert); Shortsword (+18 1d6+4 P/S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Weapon Tricks: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Debilitating Strike: (F) Successful Strike against a flat-footed foe also inflicts a choice from: -10 Speed until the end of the next turn; enfeebled 1 until the end of the next turn
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 10
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against the triggering attack when unencumbered
Sabotage: (1) Successful Thievery vs. Reflex inflicts 40 HP damage, or 80 HP on a critical success, to an item with moving parts possessed by a creature within reach
Sidestep: (R) Redirects a failed Strike on self to an adjacent creature
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +2d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Trap Finder: +2 Armor Class vs. traps
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Weapon Tricks: Critical hits with an unarmed attack, rogue weapon, or a simple agile or finesse weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflict its critical specialization effect
Save: Fortitude: +16 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +20 (dexterity; master); Will: +15 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Cat Fall: Suffers 50' less damage from falling
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Trap Finder: +2 vs. traps
Unwavering Mien: Reduces the duration of mental effects lasting at least 2 rd by 1 rd/Saves vs. sleep effects gain +1 degree of success
Magic
Spell Slots: A1: 1; A2: 1; A3: 1; AC1: 2 Attack: Arcane Innate: +14 (charisma; trained); Arcane: +16 (intelligence; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 24 (charisma; trained); Arcane: 26 (intelligence; trained)
Spells:
Daze (A0 Enc): 1
Detect Magic (AC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Invisibility (A2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Lightning Bolt (A3 Evo): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Magic Missile (A1 Evo): (1) R120' 1 missile (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 missiles) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional missile per action)
Ray Of Frost (A0 Evo): 1
Magic Notes:
Basic Wizard Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level arcane spell
Seer Elf: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate cantrip
Wizard Dedication: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Can prepare 2 arcane cantrips each day
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Wizard Dedication: Owns a spellbook with 4 arcane cantrips
